name: Reflexe
description:
A 1v1 reflex game. Be the fastest ! Made for the 7Fault's arcane machine.

Keys for pc players :
- z/q/s/d => red player arrows
- r/t/y => red player buttons
- up/down/right/left => blue player arrows
- i/o/p => blue player buttons
- Enter => green button

Credit : Tiziano Maisonhaute
